name: simple-web-cli

scripts.patch: npm run update; npm run test-services && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version;
scripts.minor: npm run update; npm run test-services && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version;
scripts.major: npm run update; npm run test-services && npm version major --no-git-tag-version;
scripts.update: npx npu; npm i --ignore-scripts; npm audit fix;
scripts.reinstall: npm run build; npm uninstall simple-web-cli -g; npm link ./; npm run test-services;

author: https://github.com/wellwelwel
